9 July 2009

Writing As I Learn

by Aaron Lord

“I count myself one of the number of those who write as they learn and
learn as they write.”
– John Calvin, quoting Augustine, in The Institutes, p. 5<p>HT: John Piper, “The Pastor As Scholar”, sermon<p>Sent from my iPhone<div class="blogger-post-footer"><img width=’1’ height=’1’ src=”https://www.devlord.io/blog/writing-as-i-learn/”’ /></div>
